>>===== MODE =====>>
bibliography
<<===== MODE =====<<


>>===== RESULT =====>>
<div class="csl-bib-body">
  <div class="csl-entry">Foo.</div>
  <div class="csl-entry">Bar. “Retrieved from https://example.org.”</div>
</div>
<<===== RESULT =====<<


>>===== CSL =====>>
<style xmlns="http://purl.org/net/xbiblio/csl" version="1.0">
  <macro name="retrieved">
    <group>
      <text term="retrieved" text-case="capitalize-first" suffix=" " />
      <text term="from" suffix=" "/>
      <text variable="URL"/>
    </group>
  </macro>
  <bibliography>
    <layout suffix=".">
      <group delimiter=". ">
        <text variable="title" />
        <text macro="retrieved" quotes="true" />
      </group>
    </layout>
  </bibliography>
</style>
<<===== CSL =====<<


>>===== INPUT =====>>
[
    {
        "issued": {
            "date-parts": [
                [
                    "2004", 
                    "10", 
                    21
                ]
            ]
        }, 
        "title": "Foo", 
        "type": "article-journal"
    }, 
    {
        "URL": "https://example.org", 
        "issued": {
            "date-parts": [
                [
                    "2004", 
                    "10", 
                    21
                ]
            ]
        }, 
        "title": "Bar", 
        "type": "article-journal"
    }
]
<<===== INPUT =====<<
